price: Vor Allah ist nichts verborgen, weder auf der Erde noch im Himmel.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ شَيۡءٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha lā yakhfā ʿalayhi shayon fī al-arḍi walā fī al-samāi
